mapper.update: update t_food_package set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PKGSERIAL = #{pkgserial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PKGNAME = #{pkgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PKGTYPECODE = #{pkgtypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PKGSERIAL, PKGNAME, PKGTYPECODE from t_food_package where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PKGSERIAL, PKGNAME, PKGTYPECODE from t_food_package
